comment: loved her as a professor. she provided feedback to assignments. vocab test every week, which were hard at first but ngl got easier. we did have a lot of group projects on teams but she does not grade those badly, just do them and you'll get a 100 most likely. only con is that her instructions can get confusing.

Frau Carlson is a great teacher! The assignments are clear most of the time. There is a weekly vocab quiz based off the vocab in the FREE textbook/website provided, then a test after every chapter of the vocab is done (3 chapters). There is group work which is done on teams but is super easy and repetitive, just communicate with your group members!

Professor Carlson is very nice and caring! I have never attempted to learn German before, but she made the class as easy as possible. She gives great feedback and understands that this is our first time learning German. She always responds to emails in a friendly manner. The class itself is well organized as well. Definitely recommend her!

Prof C is very sweet & caring. I took as an online class & though it was my 1st time learning German, she made it so easy. 3 exams, I got over 95s on all. There are about 8 discussion posts which is just speaking into a microphone. Then there are written things which are easy. She doesn't expect you to be perfect. She gives great feedback & help.
